mapper.select: select ID, PID, LEVEL, AREA_NAME, AREA_CODE, PLAN_CNT, PLAN_AREA_TOTAL, PLAN_AREA_SUMMARY, DESIGN_CNT, DESIGN_AREA_TOTAL, DESIGN_AREA_SUMMARY, NOTE from area_view where dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by pid, ID
